description: Nonnegative integers n such that n^2*(n+1)*(2*n+1)^2*(7*n+1)/36 is a square.
references: Mentioned in a problem on p. 334 of Two-Year College Math. Jnl., Vol. 25, 1994.
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<0, a(-1-n), if( n<2, n>0, 16 * a(n-2) - a(n-4) + 8))} /* _Michael Somos_, Jul 27 2002 */(PARI) {a(n) = local(w); if( n<0, 0, w = 8 + 3*quadgen(28); n = ((n+1)\2) * (-1)^(n%2); imag(w^n) + 4 * (real(w^n) - 1) / 7)} /* _Michael Somos_, Jul 27 2002 */
author: John C. Hallyburton, Jr. [ hallyb(AT)vmsdev.enet.dec.com ].
